Paragraph: 26 years of experience in the Engineering and Construction fields (2 - SENTENCES) ; 8 years project management experience | Sustainable design experience from conceptualization to building occupancy | Diverse client profile: Medical, Research & Development, Commercial, Educational and Industrial (10 plus years (not exact dates or culminating years) A competent Project Engineer with excellent communication, organisation and
co-ordination skills. Possessing a proven track record of preparing and executing
project plans and programmes, ensuring that work is carried out in accordance
with the companies procedures and clients satisfaction. Able to ensure timely,
safe and cost effective design and implementation during the life cycle of projects
from conception till customer satisfaction.
Currently looking for a suitable Project Engineer or consultant position with a
forward thinking employer.

Experience of interpreting specifications and preparing technical proposals.
Ability to multi-task in a demanding engineering environment.
A strong track record in delivering projects on time and within budget.
Able to ensure that all H&S procedures are met and maintained.
Resolving complex technical issues and coming up with fast efficient solutions.
Ability to assess the financial feasibility and impact of proposed budget items
and also alternatives.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Political and Public Affairs Canvasser - Full Training

Location: Jacksonville, FL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, Marketing, Sales

Description:
MAC Partners is one of the top marketing and consulting firms in the state of Florida. We are strategicpartners with clients in the political and public affairs sectors. We have our eyes set on some massiveexpansion goals through the end of this year, and that is why we are expanding our canvassing team.We pride ourselves on our belief that everyone deserves an equal opportunity to achieve success andcareer growth. Through complete, in-house training, we offer each member of our canvassing teamunlimited growth potential within our company towards senior management roles. We are currentlyseeking self-motivated, ambitious, entrepreneurial-minded individuals to join our canvassing team and areexcited to lobby for positive change here in the state of Florida.
What Does a Canvasser Do?
● Shadow seasoned members of the marketing department to grasp the basics of the entry-levelrole in marketing, local event management, developing effective marketing campaigns,strategizing, and improving metrics to achieve our client’s set targets● Educate local voters on the benefits of our current petitions● Represents our clients in a courteous, professional, and friendly manner at all times● Keep detailed reports of voter interactions to send back to clients for their records● Attend daily marketing campaign meetings to establish goals and expectations while contributingindividual ideas to help improve our current strategies● Set up local events at college campuses, sporting events, etc.What Requirements Must You Have?● High school diploma/equivalent or Bachelor’s degree is preferred● 1-3 years of experience working as a Marketing Associate, Brand Ambassador, ClientRepresentative, Sales Representative, or related fields● A resilient attitude and a desire for a career-oriented opportunity● A team spirit and the ability to work both independently and collaboratively● Excellent communication skills and an unmatched work ethic● A proven ability to bring a brand story to life and increase sales margins for clients● A charming, well mannered, and trusting demeanorWhy MAC?● Competitive hourly pay PLUS bonuses● Unlimited resources to network with the top marketing professionals in the industry● Equal opportunity for growth that is dependent on the individual performance● Team building activities and company-funded events
● Welcoming team atmosphere and supportive management staff that genuinely cares about thegrowth and success of the team● Holiday closures to spend quality time with family and friends● Onboarding bonus

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
